abstract: Barney Frank and Christopher J. Dodd received a hero’s welcome during a visit to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, the watchdog agency created as part of the 2010 financial regulation law that bears their names.

headline.main: Christopher Dodd and Barney Frank Are Welcomed at Watchdog Agency They Helped Create

snippet: Barney Frank and Christopher J. Dodd received a hero’s welcome during a visit to the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau, the watchdog agency created as part of the 2010 financial regulation law that bears their names.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
